code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddProduct=_ref=>{let{socket}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState("");const[price,setPrice]=useState(0);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();socket.emit('addProduct',{name,price,owner:localStorage.getItem("userName")});navigate("/products");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"addproduct__container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add a new product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"addProduct__form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"name",children:"Name of the product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"price",children:"Starting price"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"price",value:price,onChange:e=>setPrice(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"addProduct__cta",children:"SEND"})]})]})});};export default AddProduct;
